title: Welcome to the Horde
description: You sent your first Monstergram!

title: Accomplished Monsterizer
description: You sent 27 Monstergrams to your friends. We reward you for such ambition!

title: Deliverator
description: You sent 103 Monstergrams! You are a true Monster, and we mean that in a good way!

title: Efficiency Award
description: You sent Monstergrams to six friends at once! Think of all the time you saved.
hint: Kill a few birds with one stone.

title: Lucky 13
description: You got monstergrams from thirteen different friends. You're a lucky critter!

title: Schmoozinator
description: You've sent Monstergrams to seven new players. Thanks for expanding the numbers of the collective, citizen.
win conditions: sent monstergrams to 7 different people who don't have accounts

title: Pumpkin Snatcher
description: You got four Monstergrams with pumpkins. Such versatile gourds, aren't they?
hint: Get your friends to send you gourds.
win conditions: received four of: M16, M18, M28, M37, M63

title: Arachnid Wrangler
description: You sent three spider related Monstergrams. Who doesn't love a good spider?
hint: Won't someone think of the spiders?
win conditions: sent three of M5, M23, M24

title: Totally Baked
description: You sent four different cookies. Cookies are a symbol of universal love, you know.
hint: Cakes and cookies are your special friends.
win conditions: sent four of: M3, M4, M9, M14, M23

title: Trick or Treater
description: You have received three candies. Probably because you're soooo sweet.
hint: You need candy or you will explode.
win conditions: received three of M2, M10, M11, M32.

title: Zombie Master
description: You sent five zombies to do your bidding. Zombies do need direction and all.
win conditions: sent five of M13, M35, M45, M92, M93, M94, M95

title: Repeat Offender
description: You logged in four days in a row. Yes, we noticed.
win conditions: logged in 4 days in a row

title: Monstrous Addiction
description: You logged in eleven days in a row. We know, it's hard to stay away!
win conditions: logged in 11 days in a row

title: Halloween Haunter
description: Happy Halloween! Now go forth and dish out some spooky fun.
hint: Make sure to be on for the big day!

title: Van Helsing
description: You've received five vampires from your friends. Stock up on garlic and stakes, or consider investing in a nice castle.
win conditions: received five of: M27, M30, M46, M47, M76, M87, M96, M114

title: Cat Whisperer
description: You got three catty Monstergrams. Way to work that animal magnetism!
hint: Everywhere you look, cats are watching you.
win conditions: received three of: M25, M29, M56, M89, M97

title: Bone Collector
description: You sent three Monstergrams containing bony human remains. We salute your apparent comfort with the concept of death!
win conditions: sent three of: M32, M41, M45, M99, M113

description: clowns

description: cuteness

description: cute critters
hint: Adorable, soft, and fuzzy is how you roll.

title: Affinity for Blades
description: knives
hint: Let's keep things sharp and stabby.

title: Wardrobe Consultant
description: costume parts
hint: The people of the internet need costume help.

title: Ghost Whisperer
description: You aint 'fraid of no ghosts! You've sent 3 ghostly dedications. The more the scarier!
hint: Express your support for the disembodied

description: creepy stuff
